data.message: the last time i got robbedbysomeguys i had em lobotomized by putting a shottybetweentheyeyes don't fuck with mr small fries i'll leave it to you to read between the lines so think twice before fucking with me because i won't hesitate to leave you with two black eyes and leave you so embarrassed that you tell people you got jumped by two black guys when the truth is you just got your ass handed to you by someone less than half your size lol test me and you'll get that throat sprayed with this serrated blade call the cops that won't make me leave fuck peace bitch namaste get it haha  these middle class parents don't get it that when it comes to me being explicit the realest can't resist it i know what your thinking your thinking how many motherfucks will i use well i don't motherfuckin know im just gonna motherfucking keep going till i run out or just use em all up see. i've only been doing this on and off for about 7 months im unstoppable what's your excuse i eat your rhymes plus mine like lunchables

replies.message: "Here's my ten cents, my two cents is free...." This isn't bad...but it needs a couple of rewrites to clean up some bars, there are a few rhymes that seem like you took the easy path, also it's very clearly an imitation of Marshall...which is cool but you aren't going to do it better than him, try to make it your own a bit more.

yeah well clearly i rap from the heart and just because i rapped angry this time doesn't mean that's all i do if you go back to the last couple pics em put up you might notice my original flow but naw just because i i freestyle up with an angry flow you think im trying to copy something that's not even my style that was for fun but i could care less bc you can't even see the lyrical advantage im capable of so you can't respect it
